data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Mila, Algeria to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 766,377 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mila, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Mila, Algeria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 188 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Mila, Algeria.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Mila access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Mila, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people know you.
God, we pray for the believers in Mila, Algeria that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Pour your Spirit out on the 766,900 citizens of Mila, Algeria, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Mila, Algeria.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Mila
